FAQ.question: Can I compress my videos using MP4 Compressor?
FAQ.answer: MP4 Compressor allows you to compress MP4 video files. For other file formats like MOV, you can choose our MOV Compressor. You only have to upload your video, select the encoding speed and CRF value and click on save Your file will be compressed as per your desired size.

FAQ.question: How long will it take to upload my video?
FAQ.answer:
The time taken to upload your video for cropping or editing depends on the size of your video. Better quality videos with higher resolution will take more time to upload as compared to low-quality videos with lesser resolution.
MP4 Compressor allows you to compress MP4 video files. For other file formats like MOV, you can choose our MOV CompressorYou only have to upload your video, select the encoding speed and CRF value and click on save Your file will be compressed as per your desired size.

FAQ.question: What is CRF value?
FAQ.answer: Constant rate factor (CRF) is an encoding mode that adjusts the file data rate up or down to achieve a selected quality level rather than a specific data rate. CRF values range from 0 to 51, with lower numbers delivering higher quality scores.

FAQ.question: Will the quality of my videos decrease after compressing?
FAQ.answer: When you compress a file, the file size will be reduced and to do that, the quality has to be cmpromised. To make sure that you do not lose out the qualily, MP4 Compressor allows you to choose the quality of the video as per your requirement. If you want high quality video, you can choose a higher resolution and the file size will be bigger. But if you care about the size of the file and can compromise in the size then chose a lesser resolution.

FAQ.question: What are the resolutions available and what will be the size of the file of different resolutions?
FAQ.answer: MP4 Compressor provides all the standard resolutions i.e., 1080p, 720p, 480p, 360p, and 240p. Keep in mind that a higher resolution file size will be more than a file with lower resolution. The size of the file will also depend on the length of the video, the resolution, the aspect ratio and the CRF values.

FAQ.question: What are encoding speeds?
FAQ.answer:
MP4 Compressor allows you to choose encoding speed i.e., the speed at which you want to convert the video and save it for download. The encoding speeds available with MP4 Compressor are ultrafast, superfast, very fast, faster, fast, medium, slow, slower, very slow.
The slower the speed the better is the compression. MP4 Compressor provides a wide range of encoding speeds according to the varying needs of our users and ensures to provide the best quality videos for each edit made by the user.

FAQ.question: Will I be charged to use the website?
FAQ.answer: Our website is absolutely free and you can use it as many times as you want. There are no free trial uses, after which you will have to pay for using our services. We won't charge you anything.

FAQ.question: Will I have to create an account to use MP4 compressor?
FAQ.answer: Our website does not require you to sign up or create an account. The platform is absolutely free and you can compress as many files as you want.

FAQ.question: Is it safe to use MP4 compressor?
FAQ.answer: Yes, it is 100% safe to use an MP4 compressor, as we do not save your files, and there are no third-party ads on the website. Your data will be safe and secure with us.

FAQ.question: Will my uploaded files be saved on the server?
FAQ.answer: All processing is done on your browser, and no files are transferred to the server. Hence your files are 100% safe.

FAQ.question: Can I download the file after compressing in any other format?
FAQ.answer: MP4 Compressor allows you to edit your videos as per your need and requirements providing multiple attributes and functions. You can download the edited video in MP4 format only. However, you can use our other websites like MOV Converter, to finally convert your video in your desired format.
